result: import React from'react';var SPACING={EXTRA_SMALL:2,SMALL:4,MEDIUM:8,LARGE:16,EXTRA_LARGE:32};function SpaceXS(props){return SpaceElement(props,'extra-small');}function SpaceS(props){return SpaceElement(props,'small');}function SpaceM(props){return SpaceElement(props,'medium');}function SpaceL(props){return SpaceElement(props,'large');}function SpaceXL(props){return SpaceElement(props,'extra-large');}function SpaceElement(props,spaceVariant){var classNames=(props.className||'').split(' ');classNames.push("alegrify-space--".concat(spaceVariant));return React.cloneElement(props.children,{className:classNames.join(' ')});}export default SPACING;export{SpaceXS,SpaceS,SpaceM,SpaceL,SpaceXL};SpaceXS.__docgenInfo={"description":"","methods":[],"displayName":"SpaceXS"};SpaceS.__docgenInfo={"description":"","methods":[],"displayName":"SpaceS"};SpaceM.__docgenInfo={"description":"","methods":[],"displayName":"SpaceM"};SpaceL.__docgenInfo={"description":"","methods":[],"displayName":"SpaceL"};SpaceXL.__docgenInfo={"description":"","methods":[],"displayName":"SpaceXL"};
